channel.title: Playing lan/compileing client
channel.description:
Hello im using
Element-X Client+server files
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,484831.0.html
i opened class.java in the client files and changed the ip to mine (or should i of changed it to local host?idk lol) then i tryed to compile it and i get this error
note:some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. note:recompile with -xlint:unchecked for details. press any key to continue [code]@echo off cd . "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java pause [/code]
im trying to make a lan server at my house i figured i needed to compile the client so it connects to my pc but idk im just confused
any idea's or help would be great
or a link to a good premade lan server idk... any input would help =D

programming, irc, cars

i opened class.java in the client files and changed the ip to mine (or should i of changed it to local host?idk lol) then i tryed to compile it and i get this error

note:some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
note:recompile with -xlint:unchecked for details.
press any key to continue

@echo off cd . "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java pause

im trying to make a lan server at my house i figured i needed to compile the client so it connects to my pc but idk im just confused

any idea’s or help would be great

or a link to a good premade lan server idk… any input would help =D
